Lyric:
[00:14.79]There's a hero
[00:19.14]If you look inside your heart
[00:23.34]You don't have to be afraid
[00:27.50]Of what you are
[00:31.14]There's an answer
[00:34.85]If you reach into your soul
[00:39.22]And the sorrow that you know
[00:43.16]Will melt away
[00:47.36]
[00:48.39]And then a hero comes along
[00:53.38]With the strength to carry on
[00:57.51]And you cast your fears aside
[01:01.38]And you know you can survive
[01:05.31]So when you feel like hope is gone
[01:09.30]Look inside you and be strong
[01:13.21]And you'll finally see the truth
[01:17.27]That a hero lies in you
[01:24.46]
[01:26.56]It's a long road
[01:31.08]When you face the world alone
[01:35.52]No one reaches out a hand
[01:39.24]For you to hold
[01:43.21]You can find love
[01:46.90]If you search within yourself
[01:51.10]And the emptiness you felt
[01:55.20]Will disappear
[01:59.03]
[02:00.13]And then a hero comes along
[02:05.43]With the strength to carry on
[02:09.57]And you cast your fears aside
[02:13.29]And you know you can survive
[02:17.30]So when you feel like hope is gone
[02:21.37]Look inside you and be strong
[02:25.52]And you'll finally see the truth
[02:29.50]That a hero lies in you
[02:33.96]
[02:35.54]Lord knows
[02:40.30]Dreams are hard to follow
[02:44.34]But don't let anyone
[02:47.86]Tear them away
[02:52.50]Hold on
[02:56.90]There will be tomorrow
[03:00.94]In time
[03:03.35]You'll find the way
[03:08.50]
[03:09.52]And then a hero comes along
[03:14.06]With the strength to carry on
[03:17.75]And you cast your fears aside
[03:21.73]And you know you can survive
[03:25.58]So when you feel like hope is gone
[03:29.51]Look inside you and be strong
[03:33.75]And you'll finally see the truth
[03:37.74]That a hero lies in you
[03:45.88]
